text: @NYGovCuomo Explain to me if #COVID19 is so life threatening why is your brother able to host his show every night at 9pm? His action undermines your prolonged lockdown argument. Others young/no underlying want to get back to work, feed families, and save jobs too. #ReopenAmerica #reopen
